description: Like the best adventure partners, our lightweight, quick-drying Stryder™ Short is easy going and down for anything. Made with 100% recycled nylon, which makes it easy to recycle after a lifetime of trails and travels, this short is as sustainable as it is versatile.
name: Mountain Hardwear Stryder Swim Shorts, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Recycled Nylon Woven, Recycled Plain Weave - 100% Recycled Nylon
